title: Please, DO NOT buff Xin Zhao!
body:
For everyone who hasnt been on PBE or Surrender@20: 

Xin Zhao

    Battle Cry (W)  heal increased to 30/35/40/45/50 from 26/32/38/44/50
    Audacious Charge (E) damage increased to 70/115/160/205/250 from 70/105/140/175/210


Since hes my main jungle champ, I was of course very happy about it AT FIRST! Them I remembered what game this is. And more important, whos in charge of buffs and nerfs. 
He is fine right now, maybe not top of the mountain tier, but he can carry the game and he is fun. He is underplayed, yes, but hes not weak. 
As much as I would love these changes, I know exactly whats going to happen if they go through:
Xin gets players attention, players suddendly realise hes not weak and that with these buffs hes actually a very very good jungler, people play him, people QQ about him, and then he will be nerfed till hes down at the Bar with Urgot and Veigar. 

Please DO NOT BUFF HIM!

naut becoming viable could be the first stepping stone to a tank (jungle) friendly game again.

Sadly I disagree. I think what will happen is this. Tanks will start to rise up, Riot's upper management will not happy with the lack of "flashy" or "exciting" plays from the tanks. They will then tell the Lead Champion/Game Designers to change things up. And we will end up back at the same spot we are now.

Look, as an avid tank player, I'm just going to say this:

League of tanks has happened before. There have been times in the past where teams were sending super-tanks jungle, top, and sometimes even mid. it isn't fun. I love playing tanks. I absolutely do not want to play League of Tanks again. I don't dislike League of Tanks because it lacks "flashy lcs plays." I dislike League of Tanks because it's not fun.

IMHO, tanks are not in that terrible of a spot overall. There are individual champions who deserve buffs (definitely Zac, maybe Mundo and Naut). But there are plenty of tanks who are currently great picks in solo queue. Sion isn't the most reliable jungler, but he's an amazing top laner. Sejuani is a great jungler all around. 

After this new jungler item goes through, I think a lot of tanks will be in a fine spot. I legitimately hope Riot doesn't go overboard buffing them.

Because league of tanks is terrible.

I main Sejuani and keep seeing her a lot more than I used to... It makes me very afraid.
There were times when I was asked not to jungle with her "since shes so weak".. but now people are happy about me picking her.
It's a nightmare come alive.
